resources.string: Welcome to GPS Ping! If you have bought a GPS tracker we will show you how to set it up. If not, please check out our store: www.gpsping.no
First charge your tracker for at least 8 hours. The tracker is fully charged when the red charge light turns off.
Take the tracker outside and push the "On" button on top of the tracker. A green and a blue light will light up.
Open the app and tap on Trackers on the main menu to view your tracker.
Go back to main menu. Make sure the name of the tracker is shown over the start button. Push start.
